tool_description: Manages container images in registries including push, pull, and metadata operations.

operation.description: Operation to perform: push, pull, list, delete

image_name.description: Name of the image to operate on

error_messages: Registry authentication failed: Verify username and password are correct.
Registry unreachable: Check registry_url and network connectivity.
Invalid operation: Use one of [push, pull, list, delete].
Image not found: Specified image_name and image_tag do not exist in registry.
Permission denied: User lacks required permissions for this operation.
usage: Provide registry_url, username, password, operation, and image_name. Optionally specify image_tag. Returns operation results.

operation_status.description: Success or failure status of the operation
